member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiComponent.RenderComponent(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiComponent@,Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Строит компонент в указанном контейнере без учета генерации событий BeforePrintEvent и AfterPrintEvent и без учета Conditions. Построенный компонент возвращается в аргументе renderedComponent. Этот метод оставлен ради совместимости с ранее написанными компонентами. Для заново разрабатываемых компонентов необходимо использовать метод InternalRender.
member.param: Rendered component.
Panel in which rendering will be done.

member.param: Rendered component.
Panel in which rendering will be done.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.IStiPageBreak.BreakIfLessThan
member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates how much free space is on a page (in per cent) should be reserved for formation of a new page or a new column. The value should be set in the range from 0 to 100. If the value is 100 then, in any case, a new page or a new column will be formed. This property is used together with NewPageBefore, NewPageAfter, NewColumnBefore, NewColumnAfter properties.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.IStiPageBreak.SkipFirst
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, a new page/column will be generated only starting from the second case.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport.PrintToDotMatrixPrinter(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiTxtBorderType,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String)

A parameter which sets text encoding.
If true then borders are exported to the text.
Type of borders (StiTxtBorderType).
If true then empty lines will be removed from the result text.
If true then empty lines with vertical borders will be removed from the result text.
If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
Horizontal zoom factor by X axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
Vertical zoom factor by Y axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
A number of the first page to print.
A number of the last page to print.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper
member.summary: A class that helps to work with the IStiBreakable interface.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.IsCanBreak(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: If a container can be broken into two parts, then returns true for the. True is returned, if the container realizes IStiBreakable interface and CanBreak is true, or ParentBand realizes IStiBreakable interface and CanBreak is true.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.IsNeedBreak(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Returns true, if a container is to be broken and can be broken. A container may need in breaking, if it is higher than free space available for output. The ability of break is checked with the IsCanBreak method.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.Break(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Breaks the specified container in two parts which are "Continued" and "Breaked", where the "Continued" is a container, which should be output on the next page and "Breaked" is a container which will be output on the current page. A container passed as the originalContainer method parameter contains the "Breaked" container. This method returns the "Continued" container.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.SetCanBreak(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Sets the CanBreak property for all components. Do not set CanBreak to true for CrossFields and SubReports.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.ProcessBreakable(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Checks the specified container on necessity to use the Breakable interface. Until a container cannot be placed completely on a page (and it can be broken) it is broken and output on pages.

member.summary: Report engine core.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.StartIndexPageForPageTotal
member.summary: Contain start index of page for page total calculation. Used for running total

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.IndexPageForPageTotal
member.summary: Contain index of page for page total calculation.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.SilentMode
member.summary: If a variable is true then output as a band is not done.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.RenderState
member.summary: Contains an information that is necessary to show progress of report rendering.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.IndexOfLatestDataBand
member.summary: An index of the last rendered DataBand. The Index is used to put the AddLevel before this DataBand and make KeepFooterTogether properties work correct.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.generateNewPageBeforeBand
member.summary: It is required to generate a new page before the next band. A flag is used to prevent empty pages after a band. A new page is not generated after the specified band but not before the next band. If there is no the next band then there is no a new page.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.ignoreSkipFirst
member.summary: If true then the engine should ignore the value of the SkipFirst property of a band. It is necessary if NewPageAfter or NewColumnAfter are processed.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.generateNewColumnBeforeBand
member.summary: Requires to generate a new column before the next band. A flag is used to prevent empty columns after a band. A new column is not generated after the specified band but not before the next band. If there is no the next band then there is no a new column.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.pageBreakSkipFirstCollection
member.summary: Коллекция служит для определения случая пропуска генерации новой страницы или новой колонки при помощи свойства SkipFirst. Если бэнд уже пропускал один раз генерацию новой страницы или колонки, то он заносится в эту коллекцию.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.IndexOfStartList
member.summary: Contains an index that indicates a position of the beginning the current column output. If there are no columns then contains 0.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.skipFirstPageBeforePrintEvent

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.RenderFootersOnAllPages(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer,System.Int32,Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer@)
member.summary: Производит поиск и вывод внизу страницы, всех Footers из указанного контейнера вывода. Выводятся только те элементы, которые будут найдены до контейнера - маркера. Остальные элементы будут перенесены позднее на следующию страницу. Все выводимые элементы должны быть найдены в составленном ранее списке выводимых на всех страницах Footers. При обработке, контейнерам устанавливается новая позиция по вертикали внизу страницы.
member.param: Контейнер, в который нужно вывести Footers.
Индекс, начиная с которого, необходимо произвести поиск контейнера-маркера. Индекс указывается для того, чтобы не производить повторную обработку выведенных ранее колонок на странице.
Контейнер - маркер, после которого все контейнеры будут перенесены на следующию страницу.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiEngine.RenderFootersOnAllPages
member.summary: Производит поиск и вывод внизу страницы, всех Footers из указанного контейнера вывода. Все выводимые элементы должны быть найдены в составленном ранее списке выводимых на всех страницах Footers. При обработке, контейнерам устанавливается новая позиция по вертикали внизу страницы.

member.summary: Производит поиск и вывод на новой странице, всех элементов из указанного контейнера вывода. Выводятся только те элементы, которые будут найдены до контейнера - маркера. Остальные элементы будут перенесены позднее на следующию страницу. Все выводимые элементы должны быть найдены в составленном ранее списке выводимых внизу страницы бэндов. При обработке, контейнерам устанавливается новая позиция по вертикали внизу страницы.
member.param: Индекс, начиная с которого, необходимо произвести поиск контейнера-маркера. Индекс указывается для того, чтобы не производить повторную обработку выведенных ранее колонок на странице.
Контейнер - маркер, после которого все контейнеры будут перенесены на следующию страницу.

The index is represented as Index.IndexInColumnContainer, where Index is the index in the current container of output, IndexInColumnContainer is the index in the container of columns. If the index does not indicate the column container, then IndexInColumnContainer is -1.

Коллекция DataBand's, которые лежат в контейнерах расположенных прямо на странице (для заполнения).

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiPrintAtBottom.Render(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer,System.Int32,Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Finds all elements from the specified container of output and outputs them on a new page. Outputs elements which are found before the container-marker. The rest of elements will be moved on the next page. All elements should be found in a previously compiled list of bands which are output on the bottom of a page. When processing, a new vertical position on the bottom of a page is set.
member.param: A container in what bands should be output.
The Index starting with what it is necessary to find a container-marker. The Index is specified because there is no need to process again previously output clumns on a page.
A container-marker after what all containers will be moved on the next page.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges
member.summary: Enumeration describes possible user access privileges to the pdf document. User access privileges are managed by the user password. Owner with the correct owner password has all possible privileges for the content of the pdf document and a rule for setting document permissions.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.None
member.summary: User password allows only opening the pdf document, decrypt it, and display it on the screen.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.PrintDocument
member.summary: User password allows opening the pdf document, decrypt it, display it on the screen and print its content.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.ModifyContents
member.summary: User password allows modifying the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.CopyTextAndGraphics
member.summary: User password allows copying text and graphics objects from the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.AddOrModifyTextAnnotations
member.summary: User password allows adding or modifying text annotations in the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.All
member.summary: User password allows all modifications on the content of the pdf document.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions
member.summary: Class for adjustment all aspects of Stimulsoft Reports.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine
member.summary: A class which controls of settings of the report engine.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowFixOldChartTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates that bug with loading old charts (without Direction property) will be fixed during loading of report.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AdvancedRetrievalModeOfDatabaseInformation
member.summary: If true then database information will be required from database with help of DataAdapter (instead Connection.GetSchema).

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.RetriveColumnsMode
member.summary: Value which describes mode of retrieving database information.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowPrepareSqlQueries
member.summary: If true then will be call Prepare() method for queries for each run.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.DefaultUnit
member.summary: This property stores units’ values by default. If null, then millimeters of or hundredths of inches are used, depending on the regional settings.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowUseOriginalFontName
member.summary: This value indicates that the OriginalFontName property should be used when serializing a report. The OriginalFontName property stores the name of the original font name, even if this font is not present in the system. Using this option is not recommended in ASP.NET.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowInteractionInChartWithComponents
member.summary: This value indicates that it is necessary to simulate interactivity for charts with text elements.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowResetValuesAtComponent
member.summary: Allows to reset properties (TagValue, HyperlinkValue, BookmarkValue and ToolTipValue) to null before report rendering.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.PrintIfDetailEmptyDefaultValue
member.summary: The default value for the PrintIfDetailEmpty property of the DataBand component.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowSetCurrentDirectory
member.summary: If the property is set to true, then the compiler may change the CurrentDurectory property before compilation.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.DefaultValueOfAllowApplyStyleProperty
member.summary: The default value for the AllowApplyStyle property of the StiChart component.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.AllowProgressInThread
member.summary: If the value is set to true, then the progress window of report rendering is run in another thread.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.ApplyStylesInAutoSeries
member.summary: The value allows applying a chart style to self-series.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.OldChartPercentMode
member.summary: Allow using the old mode of formatting percent in charts.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.DontSaveDataSourceBeforeChartRendering
member.summary: If the property is set to true, then, before chart rendering, the report engine will not remember a position in the data source used for the chart.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.DontSaveConfig
member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates that config file "Stimulsoft.Report.config" is not saved from report engine.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.DontSaveSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates that config file "Stimulsoft.Report.settings" is not saved from report engine.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.DefaultEngineVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the default report engine for new report.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.UseAdvancedPrintOnEngineV1
member.summary: If the property is set to true, the report generator will use the PrintOn property when rendering a report. Using this mode is not recommended because of problems with page numbers. If the property is set to false, then the property will be processed after rendering a report.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiOptions.Engine.UseAdvancedPrintOnEngineV2

member.summary: Prints report to dot-matrix printer in the RAW mode.
member.param: A name of the printer.
A parameter which sets text encoding.
If true then borders are exported to the text.
Type of borders.
If true then empty lines will be removed from the result text.
If true then empty lines with vertical borders will be removed from the result text.
If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
Horizontal zoom factor by X axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
Vertical zoom factor by Y axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
A number of the first page to print.
A number of the last page to print.
Use Escape codes in text.
Name of the Escape codes collection to use.
